sentences.sContent: I certainly never expected to become a writer.
sentences.sCn: 我当然从未期望自己成为一名作家。
这些东西肯定不是我的。

sentences.sContent: The girl was almost certainly murdered.
sentences.sCn: 几乎可以肯定，这个女孩是被人谋杀的。

sentences.sContent: ‘Not smoking has made a real difference.’ ‘It most certainly has.’
sentences.sCn: “不抽烟确实大不相同。”“这当然了。”

words.tran: 某一；必然的；确信；无疑的；有把握的
